website_summaries.verdict: A decent set of wireless headphones with a better than average battery life.
pros: The option to connect the headphones to the audio source gives people the choice to go wired or wireless
cons: Bluetooth connection can be spotty on some phones depending on the distance between the headphones and the device

customer_reviews.title: Even Audiophile Nut Job Hubby approves
customer_reviews.text: For a bluetooth stereo headset this one is fantastic. Hubby is an audiophile nut job and I can't begin to state how much money he has spent on 'cans' over the years. Oh I could but I'd just start thinking about all the things that money could have been used for. These are the only bluetooth wireless headsets that he will alllow to adorn his big noggin with when he's away from the high end toys that of course use oxygen free cables ..I think that's what he called them..anyway this is a great headset...
customer_reviews.author: Juliette A Dimitrov

customer_reviews.title: This headphone is a real wonder.
customer_reviews.text: - This headphone is a real wonder. - Very good design with a straight thinking. - Well made with top level material. - Without any strange odors. - Sound quality is overwhelming. - Easy to use. - Comprehensive quality is number #1. - It pairs with Samsung Note9 (version 5) . - Highly recommended. - Absolutely ten (10) stars. plus, - I knew AKG from Samsung Note9 weeks ago. I really got zero knowledge of AKG before that. - Another AKG is on the way: "AKG K240 STUDIO". - I am going to be a diehard for AKG from now on and I just cannot stop myself ... ...
customer_reviews.author: BELL

customer_reviews.title: Not bad past one snafu.
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using this for about a bit over a month, the sound quality is great but i ran into a snag the fitting that holds the l side headphone broke in side and no longer held the head phone in place which was odd being no over extraneous use was done for this to happen. I was able to makeshift a repair peace and some screws to make it work but not sure for how long. I have yet to contact the company about it. But again past that one issue they are wonderful to use,with a great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Roam

customer_reviews.title: Cool bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Saw some1 had a pair of this on n asked him How he liked them n said he was very satisfied n had them 4 about 3 yrs is what he told me so I ordered them right on here from the same bus going 2 Los Angeles on the Flixbus over the Labor Day weekend 2018. Thanks guy that recommended these cool headphones as I type this I am really enjoying these headphones!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle/Shaun

customer_reviews.title: A Pleasure For Your Ears at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I looked for high quality sound, folding on-ear, comfortable, wireless Bluetooth, professionally built, with NFC that can be used on both phones, tablets or comps and I have found the AKG Y45BT. The quality of the of the headphones sound is awesome! The frequency range is amazing. Unlike many other headphone, where the low frequencies are artificially amplified, so the "bass" sounds strong, here with the AKG Y45BT, the low frequencies are NOT too loud but CRISP. Other famous brand name sells a similar headphones for a price twice higher. The extra charge in this case is for its name only, not for the compared quality of sound and specifications. So buy smart.
customer_reviews.author: Dov Ben Amram

customer_reviews.title: For less than $100.00????
customer_reviews.text: Objectively, these are great sounding headphones. They're a bit bass forward, but the detail is exceptional and they're really comfortable. Not to be obvious, but suggest listening to a CD or vinyl rather than streaming music source if you want to get a real read on their sound. Or try Tidal. The build quality seems good, but that's a question that can only be answered by time and use....... AND they're less than $100.00. I can't imagine better sound is available anywhere at this price point. Very, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb all-around headphones
customer_reviews.text: These have superb sound quality (I listen almost exclusively to classical and lots of opera, and these are great for voices and orchestra). I'd never thought much about noise cancellation, but I live near a freeway and when using these in the garden, I was struck by how quiet my neighborhood became. The only funny thing is that if I chew, I hear that faintly in the phones, but that's not really a problem. I originally bought these for use with my iPod, but they're so good that I bought a bluetooth transmitter so I can use them with my PC as well. I've very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The power-on button is pressed frequently when folded.
customer_reviews.text: For reference, there is no mistake that the previous product used will be pressed for a long time (Release button) This is because the power is pressed too often, so it is careful to use it, and the power discharge may be worse because it is accidentally depressed.
customer_reviews.author: HYESEONG LEE

customer_reviews.title: Nice for working out
customer_reviews.text: These are good so far - sound quality is pretty solid, pairing is fast and easy. I got these because my new phone doesnt have a headphone jack and the dongle thing is awkward when working out. The sound quality is not comparable to my Sennheiser HD25s that I have used before but I didn't expect it to be. Good choice for working out if you don't want to have ear buds in. Battery life seems to be really really good.
customer_reviews.author: LFP

customer_reviews.title: BEST BT HEADPHONES UNDER $200 AUDIOPHILE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: THE AKG Y50BT IS THE BEST HEADPHONS I HAVE OWNED MABY OTHER THAN THE SHURE SRH840. THE BASS IS FULL BODIED WITH DEPTH AND A BOLDNESS IN THE LOW END. THE MIDS AND HIGHS ARE CRYSTAL CLEAR WITH LOTS OF DETAIL YOU CAN MAKE OUT ALL THE DIFFRENT INSTRUMENTS AND VOCALS ARE CLEAR NOTHING HARSH VERY SMOOTH SOUND WITH SOME WARMTH TO THE SOUND VERY GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.author: MDP

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the AKG Y50BT
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the AKG Y50BT. I like the clarity, battery life, weight and of the feel of the product. The Bluetooth range surprised me. I had my phone in my room and had to go the kitchen and the garage. No signal loss, well, not until I got to the other end of the garage. That's awesome considering there were several walls.
customer_reviews.author: Rommel Lamayo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product - but after one year - it will not work more than 45 min after full charge.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great and the noise canceling is good. It's comfort over the ears, but the real problem with this device is the battery life. First I though I didn't charge it - but trying again after a full night charge the headset worked for 45 min and then gone dead. ** update ** playing with them - I figured out they have a problem - it's not battery - they just "die" and after a min - I can turn them back again and keep using.
customer_reviews.author: kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. The battery lasts long enough for daily usage and recharges in around 2 hours. The ear part is rather small and can rotate to a certain degree so that your ears won't feel oppressed too much, especially if you wear glasses. But still feeling too airtight after wearing it for over several hours. Oh, and the color of white and brown is really ugly for me, seriously! But it's much cheaper than the black one, so who knows lol.
customer_reviews.author: Ze Geng

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere near 20hrs battery life.
customer_reviews.text: These sound very nice and they are pretty comfortable. But I am getting nowhere near 20hrs of usage before they die. I would also expect with pricier headphones to get some sort of low battery indicator. Instead they just turn off right in the middle of movie or call with no heads up at all. Not overly pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, nice quality, not for smaller heads.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these headphones as I am a fan of AKG sound and have a few others, but unfortunately for me, the headband is much too big for my head. I could not adjust it short enough to keep the cans from drooping off my ears. If you have a larger head these would work for you, and they do sound very nice
customer_reviews.author: Lytepipe

customer_reviews.title: Frail product. The bass is too strong. In bluetooth mode the sound lacks quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphone because of the awards, but the sound quality is not that good. The bass is too strong, you need an equalizer. On cable it sounds very good, but falls short on bluetooth. Really frail! One articulations is already broken. Little more than a year AKG, really?! It's still possible to use, but I need to insert the articulation every time. I will try to fix it, just need to replace the broken part. If you need to use it for long hours, go for a phone that don't put pressure on your ears. Really uncomfortable after 2 hours use.
customer_reviews.author: Usually I dont review

customer_reviews.title: Stunning sound
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a wonderfully entertaining and exciting pair of cans. Not analytical, and I wouldn’t monitor with them, but for enjoying rock, pop, electronic, or fast/aggressive jazz these things slay. Tight punchy bass and a strong midrange do wonders for their “rhythmic” sound.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nakib

customer_reviews.title: These rock. Buy them.
customer_reviews.text: These do everything I can ask of them. The Bluetooth connection is stable and can remain connected to my phone through several walls and across corridors. The sound quality is excellent, partly due to the design and partly due to their ability to use AptX . They block out a significant amount of noise, which is helpful working in noisy environments. Battery life will get me through several days of solid listening at work before needing a charge. Buttons are high quality and easy to find when on.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: ... boi
customer_reviews.text: No this review is going to be based off of a first day experience. I would not have a full thrown out review posted right now, because the headphones I just received. But from the first 4 hours only these headphones, I can tell you they've been amazing. The weight of the is acceptable, and they have this cushion that isolates the majority of the noise outside and keeps a rich sound with them.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent  Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not charging after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for about 3 months, only using them a handful of times. The battery in the headphones stopped charging so now the Bluetooth function is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jason V.

customer_reviews.title: Clamp hard on a large head
customer_reviews.text: These have great sound for the price. They are ok on my head for about an hour because the ear pads are comfortable. However the clamping force is too strong for my taste. The spring steel clamp is too strong and has resisted my attempt to re-shape it. The strong clamping does help make a tight seal to reduce sound in a noisy environment.
customer_reviews.author: FlyBoy

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion as good as it gets In the sub $200 category
customer_reviews.text: Four on the ear rather than over the ear headphones , these are pretty much as good as it gets. Build quality sound quality Bluetooth connectivity an overall package simply top notch. My one and only gripe is the obnoxious oversized AKG branding
customer_reviews.author: wayne parton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The headphones themselves are great but there is a delay when using BT devices with video. Fine with audio.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable bluetooth noise :(
customer_reviews.text: Had the same problem with BT noise as most of reviewers across the Internet. Noise is noticeable and irritating. Returned them and got Plantronics Backbeat Sense.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Grynov

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, pricey but you're getting what you paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Great noise cancellation, good sound and usually quick to connect to my phone. When I turn it on sometimes I get an odd 5 second feedback buzz before it connects to my phone. Decent connection range. Reconnects automatically if I walk out of range and back in to range quickly enough (~10 seconds).
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: ... u have and although the beats were louder I like the overall sound quality better on the AKG's
customer_reviews.text: I've compared these to some beats solo 3s that i have and although the beats were louder I like the overall sound quality better on the AKG's. (The volume is still great just incase you were wondering.) 100% buy these
customer_reviews.author: daddy pig

customer_reviews.title: so I'll just say they sounds good to me
customer_reviews.text: I am no audiophile and not going to pretend to know that I'm talking about so and don't have other headphones to compare sounds quality to, so I'll just say they sounds good to me. Good, highs, mids, and lows for a variety of music. These work well with my iPhone 8 Plus, XPS 13, Macbook Pro, and HTC 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fraud no warranty by akg in India..
customer_reviews.text: Headphones stopped working next day.Akg is not providing warranty of product in India as product is shipped internationally.More over they are saying product is no repairable even if I pay the charges.Plz don't buy from Amazon.com.I contacted service centre in Nehru place New Delhi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound, nothing mind blowing. Worth the buy. I use with my note 8👌
customer_reviews.author: GoGo Joe

customer_reviews.title: Small  sound!!
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THE HEADPHONES BECAUSE I wanted something different BUT the quality ISN'T there.. the sound ISN'T..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, looks good, quality good
customer_reviews.text: I still use this headphones and do recommend them. I use it with my blackberry keytwo and works well, last a long time battery wise, charges fast, and I have used it for traveling on airplanes and buses and it is blocks out outside noises really well. i
customer_reviews.author: MissBugzie

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Very good! The sound insulation effect is very good! It's easy to hurt your ears if you wear it for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used it mainly at home. Very good sound. Connected to my hifi system or listen on my phone using *.flac format. Rich and clear sound. Comfrtable. Use it wire and wireless.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best on ear speakers I have ever purchased. The bass alone will move you around. The highs and lows are amazing. I'm mostly into metal but I also love rap and Broadway. These headphones do not disappoint. I've been using the term "greatest purchase ever " when I describe them
customer_reviews.author: Justin_hammer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for great affordable Bluetooth headset?
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, comfortable, Bluetooth connected, great price. I just wanted a pair of headphones to wirelessly connect to my PC. And I found these. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: TonyM

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with these. Great sound output, nice equalization, and pretty good bass. Battery lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Young

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but an annoying design fault.
customer_reviews.text: These have the best sound of any Bluetooth headphones I've tried. Battery life,range and comfort are great. The problem starts when you fold them away. The Bluetooth activation button rests directly against the other ear piece. It is the reason I've had a flat battery after only a few hours of listening.
customer_reviews.author: G C MOLESWORTH

customer_reviews.title: R a memory card and the AKG and i tell in love with The headphone battery life is excellent one full ...
customer_reviews.text: When I got my Samsung galaxy 8+ I got the bundle included. That's the V.R a memory card and the AKG and i tell in love with The headphone battery life is excellent one full charge would last me a day in a half or two without being charged. I just love the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: David  S  Chaug

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality and mobility of the bluetooth feature. The pads though get pretty hot during use and makes your ears sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Domino

customer_reviews.title: There ok
customer_reviews.text: They sound fine no complaints. im not really into perfect pitch or clarity or nothing like that, im just trying to tune out the wife!!
customer_reviews.author: The Drifter

customer_reviews.title: Stopped taking a charge after a few weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: When you spend money on headphones, you expect them to work for more than a month. This was a nice price for wireless headphones - until they died after a month. Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hamway

customer_reviews.title: Not worth 130$
customer_reviews.text: Just over a year of easy use and the headphone comes off of it slips right off what's supposed to hold it on! 130$ headphones should last more than a year! Only used cple times a week on bus rides. Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: chris carter

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has worked in the music business for years, I am extremely particular when it comes to quality of sound and AKG, once again, lives up to its reputation as the gold standard when it comes to sound quality while retaining its goal for making affordable studio monitor as well as casual listening headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Shaan Dayal

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone value
customer_reviews.text: Solid build, great sound quality, soft cups. Somewhat heavy and can be tight after long periods of wear but its not unexpected for cans given the sound containment when listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: warm

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are phenomenal headphones especially for the price. The reason for 4 stars is the black paint is not durable at chips off very easily as shown in my picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are Fantastic. I have used these for 2 years. The battery life is good and the sound is phenomenal. I currently use them with a Pixel 2 XL, MacBook Pro, and iPad mini 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I thought the sound of these was quite ordinary - not nearly as good as my trusty old Koss Porta Pros
customer_reviews.text: Probably down to personal taste, but I thought the sound of these was quite ordinary - not nearly as good as my trusty old Koss Porta Pros. Disappointing as 99% of the reviews I read were positive, so to each their own I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Cary Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical
customer_reviews.text: All I could ask for in a set of bluetooth headphones. They look nice, sound great and have a decent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Booklust

customer_reviews.title: Great Material, Sound, Battery and Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I had been looking for a headphone for almost 2 months and ended up with Akg. Exactly as i expected. And, damn man, i couldn't manage to empty that battery even tho' i'm using headphone for all my working hours. The best battery life i have ever seen with a electronic device.
customer_reviews.author: dbk

customer_reviews.title: All good except the power button.
customer_reviews.text: All good except the power button. The headphone will turn itself on when you fold it, since the power button will be triggered 9 times out of 10. That really is a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamGu

customer_reviews.title: The AKG Y50BTs are amazing! Great amount of lows
customer_reviews.text: The AKG Y50BTs are amazing! Great amount of lows, mids and highs are very clear, super comfortable for long listening sessions, great battery life, quality build, aluminum side plates, folding design, carry pouch included. Highly recommend for the price! Would buy these again over Beat Solos!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones! The sound quality is awesome, and the battery lasts forever without recharging. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: Flaw in the design where they located the power button. When the headset is folded, and stored in a case, the power button is pressed by the opposite ear cup causing the unit to turn on unintentionally and drains your battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Five m
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound and good price! I had it for 6 months and then the right ear speaker just snapped off. Use it taped up. Hope you send a new one
customer_reviews.author: A.P Tol

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these for when I workout. Only had them for a little while, hope they last, great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I really like it although I pay ten dollars more
customer_reviews.author: Jiali Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life crystal-clear sound only problem I have is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life crystal-clear sound only problem I have is when I put them away they turned on again because of the on button but other than that really great
customer_reviews.author: Lance Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth headphone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality either using wire connection or Aptx enabled bluetooth no difference at all. Under standard SBC bluetooth also sound good enough with a little noise but not noticeable if not compared to Aptx.
customer_reviews.author: Santo C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I brought these for my husband and these Bluetooth headphones are the bomb!! He doesn’t hear any other noises besides his music. You will be referred!
customer_reviews.author: ittopfithediffencesben

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: My mate, bought one a year ago, one ap time have heard them. this time my old bluedio died( has brocken- by the way- T1 Bluedio is trash) decided to get AKG. And it was the most right decision in my life. Sound is amazing, dont know what about bat. life. suppose that ab 20 h. use them with motorola turbo droid and Power amp player, quite powerfull combination.
customer_reviews.author: Vitoks

customer_reviews.title: good brand and well made
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, good brand and well made. Worth the money over the 100 other no name options for less.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best bluetooth headphones in this price range
customer_reviews.text: Best bluetooth headphones in this price range. The price cannot be beat for this quality, the leather padding is soft and luxurious while the sounds are crisp. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Using it for week and like it. Sometimes it glitching, but I blame my phone (1+ 3) since it works flawlessly with PC. My previous set - Meizu HD50 and it had similar character in the sound, just cleaner in miss and crisper in highs.
customer_reviews.author: Miras

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphone
customer_reviews.text: The sound is loud but the bass is not strong enough. There's no forward or reverse button on the headphone... However, overall is good buy.
customer_reviews.author: joe ong

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Battery lasts long, build quality is good. Sound quality for the price is perfect. There are some crackling noises from time to time, but i think its because of phones Bluetooth chip not the headphones
customer_reviews.author: Simonas Dakanis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, the buttons can be pressed accidentally when folding.
customer_reviews.author: Tate

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Under moderate use, the battery life provides sufficient wireless listening time.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you like on ear headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Not going to beat this quality for the price, definitely worth picking up if you don't hate on ear headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Better thing out there for this price.
customer_reviews.text: Well built but not good for phone calls, noise cancellation or lengthy head wear. Very tight.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are so accurate and crisp when it comes to sound, and the bluetooth? Amazing, it has quite the distance without being choppy or losing sound.
customer_reviews.author: David V.

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones, nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones, but not the loudest headphones in the world. I have other bluetooth headphones that generate higher volumes and less overcompression... Sound is not as rich as they could be. After listening to everything from classical to jazz to hip hop to rock to pop to German heimat music, I find the headphones lack depth of sound. While this is not uncommon for bluetooth headphones, due to the data compression, they are far weaker than comparable sets made by JBL (one of their sister companies) and SOL Republic.... Nobody's perfect....
customer_reviews.author: T Chin

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Who need Beats, these headphones are excellent! Don't use them if you need to be aware or commuicate wit someone, you will not hear them, the noise cancelation is just that! Pure sound and nothing and no one else! Updates happy spot up for a few months and and now they are defective the cushion fell off I tried to contact the seller several times but it goes straight to voicemail these headphones are not cheap and I believe that the seller should at least answer my calls
customer_reviews.author: Wonder as I Wander

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, not beats.-
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck. Way better than those 300$ Beats. No contest.
customer_reviews.author: Oats

customer_reviews.title: Quality & Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been great headphones. I wouldn't go jogging with them, but I'm very pleased with the quality and sound of them. A good value for the price. Nice medium size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Randall

customer_reviews.title: Low-priced, but decent quality! :)
customer_reviews.text: It works fine with ASIO4ALL. The overall sound quality is awesome for its low price! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jane Joo

customer_reviews.title: Realistic music
customer_reviews.text: The best part of these headphones is how close to live music you can get. Close your eyes, and you will be there front stage.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Schultz

customer_reviews.title: I like music performance very much
customer_reviews.text: I am using it well now. My head is big and it hurts a little when I use it for a long time. I like music performance very much.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie7

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, comfortable and I like that they can lay flat when they are around my neck.
customer_reviews.author: T Umbriaco

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good overall quality of sound, maybe lacking some volume. Not too much of a bass, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: they are easy to transport and work perfectly
customer_reviews.text: primarily using the head phones with my surface pro 3. they are easy to transport and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron in Bellevue WA USA

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! I'm a headphone kinky and have just about every headphone you can imagine. These are definitely one of my favorites. The sound is clear, well balanced, and it does have a little extra in the bass department as well. The blue tooth connects very easy and the range is impressive. These are very comfortable. They're light weight and fit nicely. You can wear them all day and they don't hurt your ears at all. For the price range you can't go wrong. There are better sounding headphones but you're going to pay the price for those. If you're looking for some fun awesome headphones that won't break the bank I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Y50BT are same model with C50BT?
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order, but i wonder why AKG C50BT? Is this the same model with Y50BT
customer_reviews.author: Didit PM

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth headphones at this price range
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these headphones. The sound quality is rich, has good bass that's not overwhelming, and is an overall great value for its price.
customer_reviews.author: J Ro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound is fantastic and extremely clear, super comfortable to wear, and look pretty slick too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 5 months, but the left ear ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 5 months, but the left ear cup stopped producing noise completely one day and won't work anymore when wired in through a 3.5mm and only with BT.
customer_reviews.author: Yung-Yue Fung

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product good sound quality good design. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: paco45

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked so well for my son the first year, but unfortunately for him the headphones started acting up 2 weeks after the warranty ended. Buyer beware! Oh also the foam around the ear fell off immediately but I could fix that myself.
customer_reviews.author: kristin O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've had a lot of issues with bluetooth/wireless headphones. I took a gamble with these and they've exceeded expectations. I've never had any sort of connection issue, they're easy to pair to any device I've used them with (multiple smartphones, multiple laptops). The only complain I can think of is that the power button was poorly placed and when the headphones are folded a certain way the button is pressed often.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Perry

customer_reviews.title: AKG sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Even I returned these headphones I think they are great sounding . I didn't find those headphones very confi. but that is me,can't stand small headphones over my ears. Also on and off button way to sensitive to touch. Battery life is great and dual ability to connect wirelessly or via wire
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Gapa

customer_reviews.title: If you need headphones, you need these.
customer_reviews.text: These cans are amazing. Better than my Bose by a mile, no matter if you’re connected wirelessly or with the wire. Snug fit, but not too tight. Noise canceling. Excellent sound—none of the tones get washed out. Highly recommended if you are truly serious about your music listening.
customer_reviews.author: LGR

customer_reviews.title: I loved akg products
customer_reviews.text: I loved akg products. I have started with akg420, upgraded to akg 450 and absolutely loved both. However, this product has been a little disappointing. The sound quality is up to par, but they are very head squeezing and uncomfortable. As much as I want to love it, I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: DeepDarkFantasy

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit, great sound.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perhaps a bit too snug. While this is good for a while, and feels secure, it eventually gets tiring on my ears. Or maybe my ears just stick out too far... A bit pricey for headphones.
customer_reviews.author: stefan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Would not connect to my iPhone 7 Plus so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Shartman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are some great headphones. They are really good quality, the battery it's excellent, it lasts me three days, and if I forget to charge it I still have the cord. The only bad thing is that when you close them up, the headphones can turn on because the button is bad placed. Overall, great headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Agustín Fontana

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best Bluetooth headphones you can get.
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best headphones I have ever bought. They are super light and sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Phineas P.

customer_reviews.title: The on-off button is easy switched on (due to the location) whenever I fold ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this set of headphones a little on the heavy side. Also it feels quite warm after some usage. The on-off button is easy switched on (due to the location) whenever I fold the headphones. Won’t recommend if you’re particular about weight of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fragile ear speaker hinges
customer_reviews.text: I loved these headphones for the two and a half months before they broke at the left ear hinge.
customer_reviews.author: Braydon Hall

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great as well
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast and safe. Sound quality is great as well. It would have been better if there was a black model of the same price, but I am satisfied. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not quite satisfied with blue-tooth settings
customer_reviews.text: I'm not quite satisfied with blue-tooth settings. A sound via wire could be better for that price. But it's nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AKG affordable wireless
customer_reviews.text: The sound does not disappoint. The only annoyance is that I have to restart the bluetooth when jumping between youtube videos. I am using a 2006 computer, so, it could be just that. They are not as comfortable or adjustable as the semi-open. They do have a little weight but you forget about that once the sound starts.
customer_reviews.author: Daisey

product_meta.title: AKG Bluetooth Headphone Black (Y50BTBLK)
product_meta.description: Style:Y50BT Black| Color:BlackLooking for the proper cans to complement your style all while enabling you to freely create? Introducing the AKG Y50BT headphones. Bluetooth enabled for seamless connectivity and capable of more than 20 hours of battery life for spontaneous acts of artistry, the AKG Y50BTs feature 40mm drivers for balanced powerful sound and the same sound quality of the Y50, which was awarded with the What Hi-Fi? Sound And Vision 2014 headphone product of the Year Award. But it doesn't stop there - equal to their audio excellence is their appearance. With three bold colors and surfaces specially coated for a hybrid matte glossy look, the AKG Y50BT bring the sound and look good while doing it
feature_bullets: Bluetooth enabled for music and calls
By-pass 1.2m detachable cable included if the battery dies
